inclusion.criterion: Documented weight loss within the previous 6 months of between 5-15% of body weight, or an actual body mass index (BMI) at screening of between 17 and 20 (= 85-95% of the lower limit of ideal weight).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: An energy intake of at least 80% of the estimated requirements.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: On stable and potent antiretroviral therapy for at least 12 weeks, and in whom, in the opinion of the primary care provider, a change in antiretroviral therapy is unlikely in the next 4 months.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: CD4 cell count >50 /mm3, and HIV-copy number less than 10,000 copies/ml
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to provide informed consent and comply with the protocol
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Does the subject have concurrent severe lipodystrophy according to the subject and the investigator?
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Does the subject have a history of hypersensitivity to anabolic steroids or to growth hormone?
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Does the subject have a history of prostatic or mammary cancer?
exclusion.label: unknown
